程序包的使用
de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes

  • 使用de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics  
    de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes  
    de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.parser.pnml  
    de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.serialize  
  • de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics使用的de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes中的类 
    类和说明
    Dimension
    The dimension attribute class has a X and a Y value.
    Fill
    The fill attribute class can define a color, a gradient color, a gradient rotation, and a filling image.
    Font
    The font attribute class can define an align, a text decoration, a font family, a rotation, a font size, a font style, and a font weight.
    Line
    The line attribute class can define a color, a shape, a style, and a width.
    Offset
    The offset attribute class can define a X and a Y coordinate value.
    Position
    The position attribute class can define a X and a Y coordinate value.
  • de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes使用的de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes中的类 
    类和说明
    AbstractAttribute
    Abstract superclass of all graphic attributes.
    Fill.GradientRotation
    Enumeration to set the rotation of the gradient
    Font.Align
    Enumeration to set the text alignment
    Font.Decoration
    Enumeration to set the font decoration
    Line.Shape
    Enumeration to set the shape of the line
    Line.Style
    Enumeration to set the line style
  • de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.parser.pnml使用的de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes中的类
